TheHunted:AnemicSlap.NAME: Anemic Slap
TheHunted:AnemicSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Weak to yourself.

TheHunted:BarTheDoorCard.NAME: Bar the Door
TheHunted:BarTheDoorCard.DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, if the Warden is very far away from you, heal !M!. NL Lose !TheHunted:WardenGainLoseAmountVariable! ground.

TheHunted:CrashingBlow.NAME: Crashing Blow
TheHunted:CrashingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Lose !TheHunted:WardenGainLoseAmountVariable! ground.

TheHunted:EntropyProjector.NAME: Entropy Projector
TheHunted:EntropyProjector.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each debuff you've applied to yourself this combat. NL Gain !B! Block.

TheHunted:Evade.NAME: Evade
TheHunted:Evade.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to yourself. NL Gain !TheHunted:WardenGainLoseAmountVariable! ground.

TheHunted:Hyperpropellant.NAME: Hyperpropellant
TheHunted:Hyperpropellant.DESCRIPTION: Gain X ground. NL Gain !B! Block X times.
TheHunted:Hyperpropellant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X ground. NL Gain !B! + !M! Block X times.

TheHunted:OffensiveReboundCard.NAME: Offensive Rebound
TheHunted:OffensiveReboundCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply weak. If this attack is unblocked, return it to your hand.

TheHunted:Perseverance.NAME: Perseverance
TheHunted:Perseverance.DESCRIPTION: Gain ground whenever you shuffle your draw pile.

TheHunted:Scramble.NAME: Scramble
TheHunted:Scramble.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Gain [E]. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Discard a card. NL Gain !TheHunted:WardenGainLoseAmountVariable! ground.

TheHunted:SharpTurn.NAME: Sharp Turn
TheHunted:SharpTurn.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.
TheHunted:SharpTurn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#7fff00]Draw a card.[] NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

TheHunted:VolatileGrenadeCard.NAME: Volatile Grenade
TheHunted:VolatileGrenadeCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! vulnerable to yourself.
